amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the treatment of certain imported recycled halons.

vote.text: Amendment SA 673 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 673 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S6451-6456; text: CR S6456) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the treatment of certain imported recycled halons.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 673 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 673 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator DeWine.
